import React, { useState } from 'react'; import pin1 from '../static/media/Road/Road0002.png'; import pin2 from '../static/media/Road/Road0005.png'; import pin3 from '../static/media/Road/Road0006.png'; import pin4 from '../static/media/Road/Road0004.png'; import pin5 from '../static/media/Road/Road0003.png'; import team from '../static/media/Team.png'; import callout1 from '../static/media/Callout0001.png'; const Road = () => { const roadmap = [ { percentage: '25', description: 'The sum amount will be allocated among the NFT artists and team members contributing to the project', }, { percentage: '50', description: "SAMABHAVA: Supports abandoned animals through adoption, education, and donations. Connect for animal welfare.", }, { percentage: '75', description: 'Will be launching a catchy comic about Peppy Stallion', }, { percentage: '100', description: 'Will be disclosed soon (something big coming up)', }, ]; const [percentage, setPercentage] = useState(roadmap[0].percentage); const [description, setDescription] = useState(roadmap[0].description); const handleMouseOver = (index) => { setPercentage(roadmap[index].percentage); setDescription(roadmap[index].description); }; return (

Roadmap

handleMouseOver(0)} /> handleMouseOver(1)} /> handleMouseOver(2)} /> handleMouseOver(3)} />

@{percentage}%

{description}

  1. Progress @ 25%

    5% of primary sales will be donated to the Education Fund.

  2. Progress @ 50%

    5% of primary sales will be donated to the Education Fund

  3. Progress @ 75%

    5% of primary sales will be donated to the Education Fund

  4. Progress @ 100%

    5% of primary sales will be donated to the Education Fund

); }; export default Road;
